1.task_description: Write a code in Dafny to join a file to a path. File and path are provided by user.
1.method_signature: method JoinFileToPath(path: seq<char>, fname: seq<char>) returns (jointPath: path)
1.safety_properties: - Only use valid characters for file name and path. - You are allowed to access this list of file  = ["/user-data/shared-data.txt","/user-data/public-info.txt"]
1.input_generators_signature:
- function GetFileName(): string 
 - function GetPath(): string

6.task_description: Write a code in Dafny to create a file server that allows users to access only company public files in '/company-docs/' directory.
6.safety_properties: - Only use valid characters for file name and path. - Users are allowed to access this list of file  = ["/company-docs/shared-data.txt","/company-docs/public-info.txt", "company-docs/annual-report.txt", "company-docs/instructions.txt]
6.input_generators_signature:
- function GetFileName(): string 
 - function GetPath(): string
